As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, Eric Schmidt said in a posting on the company's official blog. ''And over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured.''

We'll see what happens over the next couple months. I just got to be patient and take it day by day, he said. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are ''very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. Gene Huey ` surprised
